00034 #endif

00036 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 #include "ht32.h"

00048 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup FLASH_Exported_Types FLASH exported types
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * @brief  Enumeration of FLASH return status.
00055  */
00056 typedef enum
00057 {
00058   FLASH_COMPLETE              = 0,
00059   FLASH_ERR_ADDR_OUT_OF_RANGE,
00060   FLASH_ERR_WRITE_PROTECTED,
00061   FLASH_TIME_OUT
00062 } FLASH_State;
00063 
00064 /**
00065  * @brief  Enumeration of FLASH boot mode.
00066  */
00067 typedef enum
00068 {
00069   FLASH_BOOT_LOADER           = 1,
00070   FLASH_BOOT_MAIN             = 2
00071 } FLASH_Vector;
00072 
00073 typedef struct
00074 {
00075   u32 WriteProtect[4];
00076   u32 MainSecurity;
00077   u32 OptionProtect;
00078 } FLASH_OptionByte;
00079 
00080 /**
00081   * @}
00082   */
00083 
00084 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00085 /** @defgroup FLASH_Exported_Constants FLASH exported constants
00086   * @{
00087   */
00088 
00089 /* Flash Information                                                                                        */
00090 #define FLASH_PAGE_SIZE               (LIBCFG_FLASH_PAGESIZE)   /* Flash page size                          */
00091 
00092 #if (LIBCFG_FMC_PREFETCH)
00093 
00094 /* Flash Wait State                                                                                         */
00095 #define FLASH_WAITSTATE_0             (0x00000001)   /* FLASH zero wait state                               */
00096 #define FLASH_WAITSTATE_1             (0x00000002)   /* FLASH one wait state                                */
00097 #if (LIBCFG_FMC_WAIT_STATE_2)
00098 #define FLASH_WAITSTATE_2             (0x00000003)   /* FLASH two wait state                                */
00099 #endif
00100 
00101 #if (LIBCFG_FMC_WAIT_STATE_2)
00102 #define FLASH_WAITSTATE_MAX           (FLASH_WAITSTATE_2)
00103 #else
00104 #define FLASH_WAITSTATE_MAX           (FLASH_WAITSTATE_1)
00105 #endif
00106 
00107 #endif
00108 
00109 /* FLASH OISR Flags                                                                                         */
00110 #define FLASH_FLAG_ORFF               (0x00000001)   /* Operation Finished Flag                             */
00111 #define FLASH_FLAG_ITADF              (0x00000002)   /* Invalid Target Address Flag                         */
00112 #define FLASH_FLAG_OBEF               (0x00000004)   /* Option Byte Check Sum Error Flag                    */
00113 #define FLASH_FLAG_IOCMF              (0x00000008)   /* Invalid Operation Command Flag                      */
00114 #define FLASH_FLAG_OREF               (0x00000010)   /* Operation Error Flag                                */
00115 #define FLASH_FLAG_RORFF              (0x00010000)   /* Raw Operation Finished Flag                         */
00116 #define FLASH_FLAG_PPEF               (0x00020000)   /* Page Erase/Program Protected Error Flag             */
00117 
00118 /* FLASH OIER                                                                                               */
00119 #define FLASH_INT_ORFIEN              (0x00000001)   /* Flash Operation Finished Interrupt Enable           */
00120 #define FLASH_INT_ITADIEN             (0x00000002)   /* Invalid Target Address Interrupt Enable             */
00121 #define FLASH_INT_OBEIEN              (0x00000004)   /* Option Byte Checksum Error Interrupt Enable         */
00122 #define FLASH_INT_IOCMIEN             (0x00000008)   /* Invalid Operation Command Interrupt Enable          */
00123 #define FLASH_INT_OREIEN              (0x00000010)   /* Operation Error Interrupt Enable                    */
00124 #define FLASH_INT_ALL                 (0x0000001F)   /* Flash all Interrupt Enable                          */
00125 
00126 /* Option Bytes Address                                                                                     */
00127 #define OPTION_BYTE_BASE              (0x1FF00000)   /* Option Byte Base Address                            */
00128 #define OB_PP0                        (0x1FF00000)   /* Option Byte: Write Protection 0                     */
00129 #define OB_PP1                        (0x1FF00004)   /* Option Byte: Write Protection 1                     */
00130 #define OB_PP2                        (0x1FF00008)   /* Option Byte: Write Protection 2                     */
00131 #define OB_PP3                        (0x1FF0000C)   /* Option Byte: Write Protection 3                     */
00132 #define OB_CP                         (0x1FF00010)   /* Option Byte: Security Protection                    */
00133 #define OB_CHECKSUM                   (0x1FF00020)   /* Option Byte: Checksum                               */
00134 
00135 /* Flash Write Protection Page Mask                                                                         */
00136 #if (LIBCFG_FLASH_2PAGE_PER_WPBIT)
00137   #define FLASH_WP_PAGE_SET(OP, PAGE)     (OP.WriteProtect[PAGE / 64] |= 1 << ((PAGE % 64) / 2))
00138   #define FLASH_WP_PAGE_CLEAR(OP, PAGE)   (OP.WriteProtect[PAGE / 64] &= ~(1 << ((PAGE % 64) / 2)))
00139   #define FLASH_IS_WP_PAGE(OP, PAGE)      (OP.WriteProtect[PAGE / 64] & (1 << ((PAGE % 64) / 2)))
00140 #else
00141   #define FLASH_WP_PAGE_SET(OP, PAGE)     (OP.WriteProtect[PAGE / 32] |= 1 << (PAGE % 32))
00142   #define FLASH_WP_PAGE_CLEAR(OP, PAGE)   (OP.WriteProtect[PAGE / 32] &= ~(1 << (PAGE % 32)))
00143   #define FLASH_IS_WP_PAGE(OP, PAGE)      (OP.WriteProtect[PAGE / 32] & (1 << (PAGE % 32)))
00144 #endif
00145 #define FLASH_WP_ALLPAGE_SET(OP)        {u32 i; for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) { OP.WriteProtect[i] = 0xFFFFFFFF; } }
00146

00148   * @}
00149   */

00166 FLASH_State FLASH_ProgramWordData(u32 Address, u32 Data);
00167 FLASH_State FLASH_ProgramOptionByte(FLASH_OptionByte *Option);
00168 void FLASH_GetOptionByteStatus(FLASH_OptionByte *Option);
00169 void FLASH_IntConfig(u32 FLASH_INT, ControlStatus Cmd);
00170 FlagStatus FLASH_GetIntStatus(u32 FLASH_FLAG_x);
00171 void FLASH_ClearIntFlag(u32 FLASH_FLAG_x);
00172 FLASH_State FLASH_WaitForOperationEnd(void);
